phrs.translation: 严斥, 欺侮, 吓唬
威逼某人做某事, 翻译

sentences.sentence: When I backed out of the 100 metres, an older kid tried to browbeat me into it.
sentences.translation: 当我退出100米赛的时候，一个年龄大的孩子试图逼迫我参赛。

sentences.sentence: The boss browbeat me into taking on all this extra work.
sentences.translation: 老板威逼我接受所有这个额外的工作。

sentences.sentence: They are literally trying to browbeat Japan into a state of constant submission.
sentences.translation: 他们简直是在试图恐吓日本以使其处于一种永远顺从的状态。
